org.apache.distributedlog.common.util

Interface PermitManager


  • public interface PermitManager
    Permit manager for managing permits.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  PermitManager.Permit
      A class present a permit managed by a permit manager.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PermitManager UNLIMITED_PERMIT_MANAGER 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PermitManager.Permit acquirePermit()
      Obetain a permit from permit manager.
      boolean allowObtainPermits()
      Allow obtaining permits.
      void close()
      Release the resources.

      Disallow obtaining permits.
      void releasePermit(PermitManager.Permit permit)
      Release a given permit.

      • UNLIMITED_PERMIT_MANAGER

    • Method Detail

      • acquirePermit

        PermitManager.Permit acquirePermit()
        Obetain a permit from permit manager.
        Returns:
        permit.

      • releasePermit

        void releasePermit(PermitManager.Permit permit)
        Release a given permit.
        Parameters:
        permit - permit to release

      • allowObtainPermits

        boolean allowObtainPermits()
        Allow obtaining permits.

      • disallowObtainPermits

        boolean disallowObtainPermits(PermitManager.Permit permit)
        Disallow obtaining permits. Disallow needs to be performed under the context of permit.
        Parameters:
        permit - permit context to disallow

      • close

        void close()
        Release the resources.
